records.location_details: Registration activities at a Reception Center in the context of Joint Operation Ledra 2023.
records.where_clear: Reception Center, Joint Operation Ledra, Cyprus
records.location_text_raw: registration activities performed by Frontex in Joint Operation (JO) Ledra 2023
records.uncertainty_note: Specific name of the reception center is redacted.

possible_violations.violation_name: Freedom of thought, conscience and religion
possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 10 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union
Article 21 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union

possible_violations.violation_name: Respect for private and family life
possible_violations.legal_basis: Article 7 of the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union

records.context_note: Two incidents reported where a Frontex officer allegedly forced female migrants to remove their hijab during facial image taking for registration. In the second incident, a threat of return to country of origin was also alleged. The officer denied direct threats but admitted to using imprecise language. Lack of training and interpreter availability were identified as contributing factors. Cypriot authorities confirmed retaking a photo for one incident where the migrant's hijab was removed.
records.evidence_quote: a Frontex officer forced a female to remove her hijab
